page.title: 01TRENT VALLEY CLIFTON/BEESTON
page.content: The area as a whole is very varied and has many interesting features.The river{Trent}more or less divides the block into two separate areas. North of the river the{Beeston}and} {Attenborough}district is a blend of town and countryside including in it's facilities a major telecommunications factory ,sports fields,a large nature reserve,grazing land and residential areas. South of the river again a blend of town and countryside with perhaps the {Clifton}housing estate being the most dominant area. Over the last 34 years 8,900 dwellings have been built housing a population of 30,000 people.This provides a marked contrast to the quaint and historic{Clifton Village. Other features include Trent Polytechnic and Fairham College.
